articles.title: Man in China kills 40-year-old intellectually-disabled man to replace another corpse for cremation - AsiaOne
articles.description: A Chinese court has upheld its verdict in sentencing a man to death for killing an intellectually-disabled man with the intention to use his body as a replacement for another corpse. The "body swap" case happened in Lufeng City, located in Guangdong province.…
articles.content:
